meanings.definition: A person who is attracted to people regardless of their gender identity or biological sex.
meanings.sent1: Pansexuals are individuals who are open to relationships with anyone, regardless of gender.
meanings.sent2: I have friends who identify as pansexuals and are happy to love whoever they connect with.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the pansexuals were the first ones on the dance floor, showing their inclusive spirit.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a magnet, pulling her towards pansexuals of all kinds.
meanings.sent5: In a world full of labels, pansexuals embrace love without boundaries.
